summary:
**The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014)**

This superhero movie is about Spider-Man (Andrew Garfield) protecting his girlfriend Gwen Stacy (Emma Stone) while investigating his parents' death. He faces Electro (Jamie Foxx) and his sick best friend Harry Osborn (Dane DeHaan). The film was made after the success of its predecessor and was released in 2014, grossing $709 million worldwide. Though it had good reviews for its action and effects, some critics didn't like the story or Electro's character. Later, Sony and Marvel agreed to restart Spider-Man with a new actor, Tom Holland, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
